languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, завершить суд подобным образом — супротив всяких законов и правил!"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, завершить суд подобным образом — супротив всяких законов и правил!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, завершить суд подобным образом — супротив всяких законов и правил!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against each law and every tradition!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against each law and every tradition!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “舰长大人，这样的审判方式违背了所有的律法与习俗！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这样的审判方式违背了所有的律法与习俗！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¡terminar así el juicio contradice todas nuestras leyes y costumbres!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ¡terminar así el juicio contradice todas nuestras leyes y costumbres!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、このような形で審判を終わらせることは、あらゆる法や慣習に反します！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、このような形で審判を終わらせることは、あらゆる法や慣習に反します！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ein derartiges Prozessende verstößt gegen sämtliche Gesetze und Gepflogenheiten!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ein derartiges Prozessende verstößt gegen sämtliche Gesetze und Gepflogenheiten!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous ne pouvez conclure un jugement de la sorte ! Ce serait aller à l'encontre de toutes les lois et traditions connues ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, vous ne pouvez conclure un jugement de la sorte ! Ce serait aller à l'encontre de toutes les lois et traditions connues ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Yargılamayı bu şekilde sonlandırmak, tüm kanunlara ve geleneklere aykırıdır Lord Kaptan!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, ending the trial like this goes against every law and custom!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, yargılamayı bu şekilde sonlandırmak tüm kanunlara ve geleneklere aykırıdır!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
